snippet: The maps of political districts are being redrawn again, so candidates may not be sure where they live, much less where they are running, and voters are not sure about which candidates to consider.
lead_paragraph: The maps of political districts are being redrawn again, so candidates may not be sure where they live, much less where they are running, and voters are not sure about which candidates to consider.

headline.main: The Post-Census Blues Hit Voters (and Mapmakers)
headline.print_headline: The Post-Census Blues Hit Voters (and Mapmakers)
